definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="growChance">growChance</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"/></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.ROTTEN_FLESH</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block name="value">Items.ROTTEN_FLESH</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:growChance</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:growChance</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_add"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BlackMold</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></statement><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">SMOKE_LARGE</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
